channel.title: 寶可夢招式表 on 寶可夢扮演2.0 Pokerole
channel.description: Recent content in 寶可夢招式表 on 寶可夢扮演2.0 Pokerole

item.title: 蟲屬性
item.description: 蟲屬性 Bug Moves add a sting to all your attacks. They rely on quick, low-power strikes with added effects and swarm tactics. Some Moves can call more Bug Pokémon to prevent the foe from escaping or to help you on your actions. Bug Moves don’t try to play it safe, they usually go all-out offensive or don’t go at all. If you think these Pokémon just want to bug you, take a good look, they may have a lot of friends.
